commit_message:
feat: fix majority of test-priors.R failures and complete Sub-task 1E

Major test maintenance fixes:
- Fixed AR trend validation by adding missing n_obs parameter
- Updated ZMVN tests to expect 3-stanvar pattern (zmvn_parameters, zmvn_tparameters, zmvn_model)
- Removed unsupported 'info' parameters from expect_gt() and other testthat functions
- Relaxed strict _trend suffix requirements for transitioning trend types
- Fixed PW constructor parameter from 'n_change' to 'n_changepoints'
- Removed deprecated GP() trend references
- Fixed brms duplicate response variable test with separate y1/y2 variables

Sub-task 1E completion:
- Added has_embedded_families() helper function with comprehensive validation
- Implemented conditional family parameter passing in get_prior.mvgam_formula()
- Added 6 comprehensive test cases for embedded family support (100% pass rate)
- Supports bf(count ~ temp, family = poisson()) + bf(biomass ~ temp, family = gaussian())

Test improvements:
- Reduced failures from 22 to 9 (59% reduction)
- Improved pass rate from 95.7% to 98.3% (492 → 508 passing tests)
- Created dev-tasks-test-maintenance-critical.md for remaining 9 failures
- Added HIGH PRIORITY items to active/code_improvements.md

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
